thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Kevin and Kim
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Kevin and Kim

author: Kevin and Kim
title: Kevin and Kim
text: My husband and I had been to several places looking for a dining set and bedroom set. From the moment we stepped into Home Zone we were treated very kindly. No one was ever pushy or hovered. One employee in particular Sam, was amazing! We went on a Thursday and returned the following Sunday and she remembered us and what furniture we wanted. She explained everything in great detail and was respectful the entire time. I highly recommended Home Zone for anything you may need. Great products and awesome customer service.
